thread.title: Claire Jane Law
thread.title_full: tails.com reviewed by Claire Jane Law

author: Claire Jane Law
title: Claire Jane Law
text: My 2 year old Shih-poo, Teddy, had his food arrive within 2 days of ordering, really fast delivery, very impressed, and he seems to love it, we started weaning him onto it straight away. I also bought some of the wet food for his evening meals as they sound really nice ...I've recommended you to my friends & family and my sister has placed an order ...Thank you, we'll definitely be sticking to Tails food from now on :)
